text: Tadeusz Kondrat (8 April 1908 - 19 June 1994) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 20 films between 1954 and 1979. ==Selected filmography== * Kwiecień (1961) * The Hourglass Sanatorium (1973) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1908 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Polish male film actors Category:People from Przemyśl
title: Tadeusz Kondrat
